simulation.label: SimPEG Group
simulation.tooltip: Forward modelling SimPEG Group with at least the topography and survey set

name.label: Label
name.tooltip: Provide the name for the result group

background.label: Physical property (SI)
background.tooltip: Value of the basement resisitivity (ohm-m), density (g/cc) or susceptibility (SI)

overburden.label: Physical property (SI)
overburden.tooltip: Value of the overburden resisitivity (ohm-m), density (g/cc) or susceptibility (SI)

number.label: Number of plates
number.tooltip: If more than one the plates will be parallel, equally spaced over the center of the model

plate.label: Physical property (SI)
plate.tooltip: Value of the plate resisitivity (ohm-m), density (g/cc) or susceptibility (SI)

strike_length.label: Strike length
strike_length.tooltip: Length of the plate along the strike direction

dip_length.label: Dip length
dip_length.tooltip: Length of the plate along the dip direction

dip.label: Dip
dip.tooltip: Dip of the plate in degrees from horizontal

dip_direction.label: Dip direction
dip_direction.tooltip: Direction of the dip vector in degrees from North

relative_locations.label: Relative locations
relative_locations.tooltip: If checked locations are relative to the survey center and either topography or overburden in z according to 'Depth reference' selection

easting.label: Easting (m)
easting.tooltip: If relative locations, Easting is relative to the center of the survey

northing.label: Northing (m)
northing.tooltip: If relative locations, Northing is relative to the center of the survey

elevation.label: Elevation (m)
elevation.tooltip: If relative location, Elevation is relative to the topography or overburden according to 'Depth reference' selection

reference_surface.label: Depth reference
reference_surface.tooltop: If relative locations, the depth will be below the min/mean/max (according to 'Reference type') of the reference surface chosen.

reference_type.label: Reference type
reference_type.tooltip: If relative locations, the depth will be below the min/mean/max of the 'Depth reference' chosen

diagonal_balance.label: Diagonal balance
diagonal_balance.tooltip: Assure single octree level change on corner neighbours. UBC compatible mesh

minimum_level.label: Minimum refinement level
minimum_level.tooltip: Minimum refinement in padding region: 2**(n-1) x base_cell
